mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USER_PK, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_ID, USER_EMAIL, USER_TEL, ROLE_NAME) VALUES (UUID(), #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userId}, #{userEmail}, #{userTel}, #{roleId})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET ROLE_NAME = CASE WHEN ROLE_NAME = '1' THEN 'ROLE_ADMIN' WHEN ROLE_NAME = '2' THEN 'ROLE_LOGISTICS_MANAGER' WHEN ROLE_NAME = 3 THEN 'ROLE_PRODUCT_MANAGER' WHEN ROLE_NAME = 4 THEN 'ROLE_SALES_MANAGER' END WHERE USER_ID = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_PK as userPk, u.USER_NAME as userName, u.USER_PASSWORD as userPassword, u.USER_ID as userId, u.USER_EMAIL as userEmail, u.USER_TEL as userTel, u.ROLE_NAME as roleId FROM USER u WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT U.USER_PK FROM USER U WHERE U.USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
